languages.text: "Врагам Человечества не место среди людей. И вы это знаете". {n}Руки Кассии чуть дрожат, и девушка стискивает их в кулаки.{/n} "Однако смерть — слишком милосердный приговор. То, что пережила я... было куда ужаснее".

"The enemies of Humanity have no place among humans. You know this." {n}Cassia's hands shake a little and she clenches her fists.{/n} "But death is far too merciful a sentence. What I endured... was far more terrible."
languages.original_text: "Врагам Человечества не место среди людей. И вы это знаете". {n}Руки Кассии чуть дрожат, и девушка стискивает их в кулаки.{/n} "Однако смерть — слишком милосердный приговор. То, что пережила я... было куда ужаснее".

traits.locale_text: "The enemies of Humanity don't have a place among the humans. And you know this." {n}Cassia's hands shake a little and she clenches her fists.{/n} "But death is too much of a merciful judgement. What I had been through... had been much more terrible."

"The enemies of Humanity don't have a place among the humans. And you know this." {n}Cassia's hands shake a little and she clenches her fists.{/n} "But death is too much of a merciful judgement. What I had been through... had been much more terrible."

"The enemies of Humanity have no place among humans. You know this." {n}Cassia's hands shake a little and she clenches her fists.{/n} "But death is far too merciful a sentence. What I endured... was far more terrible."

"The enemies of Humanity have no place among humans. You know this." {n}Cassia's hands shake a little and she clenches her fists.{/n} "But death is far too merciful a sentence. What I endured... was far more terrible."

"The enemies of Humanity have no place among humans. You know this." {n}Cassia's hands shake a little and she clenches her fists.{/n} "But death is far too merciful a sentence. What I endured... was far more terrible."

languages.text: “人类不该与人类之敌为伍，你很清楚。”{n}卡西娅的双手微微颤抖，握紧了拳头。{/n}“不过，若是就这么处死她，未免太过仁慈。我所遭遇的……远比死亡更加可怕。”
languages.original_text: "The enemies of Humanity have no place among humans. You know this." {n}Cassia's hands shake a little and she clenches her fists.{/n} "But death is far too merciful a sentence. What I endured... was far more terrible."

traits.locale_text: “人类不该与人类之敌为伍，你很清楚。”{n}卡西娅的双手微微颤抖，握紧了拳头。{/n}“不过，若是就这么处死她，未免太过仁慈。我所遭遇的……远比死亡更加可怕。”

languages.text: «Los enemigos de la Humanidad no tienen cabida entre humanos. Lo sabe bien». {n}Las manos de Cassia tiemblan ligeramente, y cierra los puños con fuerza.{/n} «Pero la muerte es una sentencia demasiado compasiva. Lo que tuve que sufrir... fue muchísimo peor».
languages.original_text: "The enemies of Humanity have no place among humans. You know this." {n}Cassia's hands shake a little and she clenches her fists.{/n} "But death is far too merciful a sentence. What I endured... was far more terrible."

traits.locale_text: «Los enemigos de la Humanidad no tienen cabida entre humanos. Lo sabe bien». {n}Las manos de Cassia tiemblan ligeramente, y cierra los puños con fuerza.{/n} «Pero la muerte es una sentencia demasiado compasiva. Lo que tuve que sufrir... fue muchísimo peor».

languages.text: « Les ennemis de l'humanité n'ont rien à faire parmi les humains. Vous le savez très bien. » {n}Cassia serre les poings pour dissimuler le tremblement de ses mains.{/n} « Mais la mort est une sentence encore trop clémente. Ce que j'ai enduré... était bien pire. »
languages.original_text: "The enemies of Humanity have no place among humans. You know this." {n}Cassia's hands shake a little and she clenches her fists.{/n} "But death is far too merciful a sentence. What I endured... was far more terrible."

traits.locale_text: « Les ennemis de l'humanité n'ont rien à faire parmi les humains. Vous le savez très bien. » {n}Cassia serre les poings pour dissimuler le tremblement de ses mains.{/n} « Mais la mort est une sentence encore trop clémente. Ce que j'ai enduré... était bien pire. »

languages.text: "Die Feinde der Menschheit haben keinen Platz unter Menschen. Das wisst Ihr." {n}Cassias Hände zittern ein wenig, und sie ballt die Fäuste.{/n} "Aber der Tod ist eine viel zu gnädige Strafe. Was ich ertragen musste ... was viel schrecklicher."
languages.original_text: "The enemies of Humanity have no place among humans. You know this." {n}Cassia's hands shake a little and she clenches her fists.{/n} "But death is far too merciful a sentence. What I endured... was far more terrible."

traits.locale_text: "Die Feinde der Menschheit haben keinen Platz unter Menschen. Das wisst Ihr." {n}Cassias Hände zittern ein wenig, und sie ballt die Fäuste.{/n} "Aber der Tod ist eine viel zu gnädige Strafe. Was ich ertragen musste ... was viel schrecklicher."

languages.text: 「人類の敵は人間の中には居場所はない。ご存知でしょう」{n}カシアの手が少し震え、拳を握る。{/n}「でも死はあまりにも慈悲深い宣告です。私が耐えねばならなかったことは…もっと恐ろしいことでした」
languages.original_text: "The enemies of Humanity have no place among humans. You know this." {n}Cassia's hands shake a little and she clenches her fists.{/n} "But death is far too merciful a sentence. What I endured... was far more terrible."

traits.locale_text: 「人類の敵は人間の中には居場所はない。ご存知でしょう」{n}カシアの手が少し震え、拳を握る。{/n}「でも死はあまりにも慈悲深い宣告です。私が耐えねばならなかったことは…もっと恐ろしいことでした」

languages.text: "İnsanlığın Düşmanlarının insanların yakınında yeri yok. Bunu sen de biliyorsun." {n}Cassia'nın elleri titriyor, yumruklarını sıkıyor.{/n} "Ölüm oldukça merhametli bir ceza. Benim katlanmak zorunda kaldığım şeyler... Çok daha kötüydü."
languages.original_text: "The enemies of Humanity have no place among humans. You know this." {n}Cassia's hands shake a little and she clenches her fists.{/n} "But death is far too merciful a sentence. What I endured... was far more terrible."

traits.locale_text: "İnsanlığın Düşmanlarının insanların yakınında yeri yok. Bunu sen de biliyorsun." {n}Cassia'nın elleri titriyor, yumruklarını sıkıyor.{/n} "Ölüm oldukça merhametli bir ceza. Benim katlanmak zorunda kaldığım şeyler... Çok daha kötüydü."
